li.text: Familiarize yourself with the safety precautions and functions before attempting to operate, maintain, or inspect the machine.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: The points that the operator must observe when performing machine operation and maintenance vary depending on the situation. All possible points cannot be covered in the content of this manual. Be sure to fully understand the machine, and remain constantly aware of safety and the potential hazards while doing work.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: If the safety devices or protective devices do not operate properly, stop operation of the machine and notify the supervisor or manager. The supervisor or manager must immediately notify your authorized Makino dealer or Makino service representative.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: When the machine is stopped due to an unknown cause, immediately contact the supervisor or manager, and wait for permission before restarting operation.
After installing the machine, to maintain machining accuracy, conduct periodic inspection such as performing level adjustments.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: If the stability level of the machine changes, high-accuracy machining cannot be performed. In addition, normal machining cannot be performed if the machines vibrates.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: For approximately six months after installation, it is possible for the stability level of the machine to change significantly, while the foundation stabilizes due to the machine weight.

list.style: text-align:justify; margin-top:8px; margin-bottom:15px; margin-left:26px; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Depending on the condition of the foundation or the machine usage frequency, conduct inspection and adjustment approximately every six months or every year.
